price: Ya ce: "Ku jẽfa." To a õkacin da suka jẽfa, suka sihirce idãnun mutãne kuma suka tsõratar da su; Kuma suka jẽ da tsafi mai girma."
arabic: قَالَ أَلۡقُواْۖ فَلَمَّآ أَلۡقَوۡاْ سَحَرُوٓاْ أَعۡيُنَ ٱلنَّاسِ وَٱسۡتَرۡهَبُوهُمۡ وَجَآءُو بِسِحۡرٍ عَظِيمٖ

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: qāla alqū falammā alqaw saḥarū aʿyuna al-nāsi wa-is'tarhabūhum wajāū bisiḥ'rin ʿaẓīmin
